Name: Legend of the Phoenix
About the game: If only life were as beautiful as at first sight, Full of happiness and bliss when we were together. We were meant to be loving each other, Why does it have to end with us parting? 《Legend of the Phoenix》is an otome game genre which focuses on ancient style love story. With every choice that you made at the fork road, there will be ups and downs. It might be for the better. During your solo journey in the game, you will get to meet different kinds of people. With your confidants and partners, you will feel the enjoyment of admiring the beautiful scenery. You will never feel lonely again. New style of experiencing storyline, character development system, different types of traditional China costume style. Confess your love to him, understanding each other more and relive the love that you were expecting for. Although it may seem like I'm waiting for someone else while drinking a cup of tea, but actually I am waiting for you.
